name: Talis the White

trait.name: Special Equipment
text: Talis has +1 scale mail and a wand of winter.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Winter Strike (3/Day)
text: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) cold damage.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
• 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds
• 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon (spear)
• 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, sending
• 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy, command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon, dispel magic, mass healing word, sending, death ward, freedom of movement, insect plague
description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 93
